health_data_information_systems_summary: Discussions about staff seconded to the County government who were formerly under the National government under the Betting Control and Licensing Board.
health_data_challenges: Unprocedural mode of operation of staff, failure to report revenue collected to the County government, and denial of County government revenue.
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Stop payment of the seconded staff from the former Betting Control and Licensing Board who are on the County government payroll.
health_evidence_base: Internal investigation of revenue flow and operational procedures.
